00028 #ifndef CLI_WIN_NETWORK
00029     #include <sys/types.h> // socket, bind, listen

00031     #include <netinet/in.h> // sockaddr_in
00032     #include <unistd.h> // getpid
00033 #else
00034     #include <winsock2.h> // Windows sockets
00035     #define close closesocket
00036 #endif

00053 TelnetServer::TelnetServer(Shell& CLI_Shell, const unsigned long UL_TcpPort)

00063 void TelnetServer::StartServer(void)
00064 {
00065     const int i_ServerSocket = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, 0);
00066     if (i_ServerSocket < 0)
00067     {
00068         const ResourceString cli_Error = ResourceString()
00069             .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_EN, "socket() failed")
00070             .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_FR, "Echec de la fonction socket()");
00071         m_cliShell.GetStream(ERROR_STREAM) << cli_Error.GetString(m_cliShell.GetLang()) << endl;
00072         return;
00073     }
00074 
00075     struct sockaddr_in s_SockAddr;
00076     s_SockAddr.sin_family = AF_INET;
00077     s_SockAddr.sin_port = htons((unsigned short) m_ulTcpPort);
00078     s_SockAddr.sin_addr.s_addr = INADDR_ANY;
00079 
00080     if (bind(i_ServerSocket, (struct sockaddr*) & s_SockAddr, sizeof(s_SockAddr)) < 0)
00081     {
00082         close(i_ServerSocket);
00083         const ResourceString cli_Error = ResourceString()
00084             .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_EN, "bind() failed")
00085             .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_FR, "Echec de la fonction bind()");
00086         m_cliShell.GetStream(ERROR_STREAM) << cli_Error.GetString(m_cliShell.GetLang()) << endl;
00087         return;
00088     }
00089 
00090     if (listen(i_ServerSocket, 5) < 0)
00091     {
00092         close(i_ServerSocket);
00093         const ResourceString cli_Error = ResourceString()
00094             .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_EN, "listen() failed")
00095             .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_FR, "Echec de la fonction listen()");
00096         m_cliShell.GetStream(ERROR_STREAM) << cli_Error.GetString(m_cliShell.GetLang()) << endl;
00097         return;
00098     }
00099 
00100     while (1)
00101     {
00102         const ResourceString cli_InfoWaiting = ResourceString()
00103             .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_EN, "Waiting for clients...")
00104             .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_FR, "En attente de clients...");
00105         m_cliShell.GetStream(OUTPUT_STREAM) << cli_InfoWaiting.GetString(m_cliShell.GetLang()) << endl;
00106         const int i_ConnectionSocket = accept(i_ServerSocket, NULL, NULL);
00107 
00108         if (i_ConnectionSocket < 0)
00109         {
00110             close(i_ServerSocket);
00111             const ResourceString cli_Error = ResourceString()
00112                 .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_EN, "accept() failed")
00113                 .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_FR, "Echec de la fonction accept()");
00114             m_cliShell.GetStream(ERROR_STREAM) << cli_Error.GetString(m_cliShell.GetLang()) << endl;
00115             return;
00116         }
00117 
00118         const ResourceString cli_InfoClient = ResourceString()
00119             .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_EN, "Accepting telnet connection")
00120             .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_FR, "Connexion telnet acceptée");
00121         m_cliShell.GetStream(OUTPUT_STREAM) << cli_InfoClient.GetString(m_cliShell.GetLang()) << endl;
00122         if (! AcceptConnection(i_ConnectionSocket))
00123         {
00124             return;
00125         }
00126     }
00127 }
00128 
00129 const bool TelnetServer::AcceptConnection(const int I_ConnectionSocket)
00130 {
00131     int i_Pid = 0;
00132 
00133 #ifdef CLI_TELNET_MULTI_CLIENT
00134     if (i_Pid = fork())
00135     {
00136         // Server side.
00137         return true;
00138     }
00139     else
00140 #endif
00141     {
00142         // Connection side.
00143 #ifndef CLI_WIN_NETWORK
00144         i_Pid = getpid();
00145 #else
00146         i_Pid = GetCurrentThreadId();
00147 #endif
00148         const ResourceString cli_InfoStart = ResourceString()
00149             .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_EN, "Connection started")
00150             .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_FR, "Début de connexion");
00151         m_cliShell.GetStream(OUTPUT_STREAM)
00152             << cli_InfoStart.GetString(m_cliShell.GetLang())
00153             << " " << i_Pid << cli::endl;
00154         TelnetConnection* const pcli_Connection = new TelnetConnection(m_cliShell, I_ConnectionSocket, true);
00155         m_cliShell.Run(*pcli_Connection);
00156         const ResourceString cli_InfoEnd = ResourceString()
00157             .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_EN, "Connection done")
00158             .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_FR, "Début de connexion");
00159         m_cliShell.GetStream(OUTPUT_STREAM)
00160             << cli_InfoEnd.GetString(m_cliShell.GetLang())
00161             << " " << i_Pid << cli::endl;
00162 #ifdef CLI_TELNET_MULTI_CLIENT
00163         exit(0);
00164 #endif
00165         return true;
00166     }
00167 }

00189 const bool TelnetConnection::CloseDevice(void)
00190 {
00191 #ifdef CLI_TELNET_MULTI_CLIENT
00192     close(m_iSocket);
00193 #endif
00194     delete this;
00195     return true;

00198 const KEY TelnetConnection::GetKey(void) const
00199 {
00200     if (! m_qChars.IsEmpty())
00201     {
00202         // Dequeue the received characters
00203         const int i_Front = m_qChars.RemoveHead();
00204 
00205         // Special character management.
00206         switch (i_Front)
00207         {
00208         case 27:
00209             if (! m_qChars.IsEmpty())
00210             {
00211                 if ((m_qChars.GetHead() == 91) && (m_qChars.GetCount() >= 2))
00212                 {
00213                     m_qChars.RemoveHead();
00214                     const int i_Special = m_qChars.RemoveHead();
00215 
00216                     switch (i_Special)
00217                     {
00218                     case 65: return KEY_UP;
00219                     case 66: return KEY_DOWN;
00220                     case 67: return KEY_RIGHT;
00221                     case 68: return KEY_LEFT;
00222                     default:
00223                         // Unhandled.
00224                         if ((! m_qChars.AddHead(i_Special))
00225                             || (! m_qChars.AddHead(91)))
00226                         {
00227                             GetTraces().Trace(INTERNAL_ERROR)
00228                                 << "TelnetConnection::GetKey(): "
00229                                 << "Unable to restore previously removed character from m_qChars"
00230                                 << endl;
00231                         }
00232                     }
00233                 }
00234             }
00235             break;
00236 
00237         case 8:
00238             return BACKSPACE;
00239         }
00240 
00241         const KEY e_Char = IODevice::GetKey(i_Front);
00242         if (e_Char != NULL_KEY)
00243         {
00244             return e_Char;
00245         }
00246         else
00247         {
00248             return GetKey();
00249         }
00250     }
00251     else
00252     {
00253         // Wait for characters
00254         char str_Buffer[256];
00255         const int i_Len = recv(m_iSocket, str_Buffer, 256, 0);
00256         if (i_Len <= 0)
00257         {
00258             m_cliLastError
00259                 .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_EN, "Telnet reception error")
00260                 .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_FR, "Echec de réception en telnet");
00261             return NULL_KEY;
00262         }
00263         else
00264         {
00265             for (int i=0; i<i_Len; i++)
00266             {
00267                 if (str_Buffer[i] != '\0')
00268                 {
00269                     if (! m_qChars.AddTail(str_Buffer[i]))
00270                     {
00271                         GetTraces().Trace(INTERNAL_ERROR)
00272                             << "TelnetConnection::GetKey(): "
00273                             << "Could not append character '" << str_Buffer[i] << "' "
00274                             << "to m_qChars" << endl;
00275                     }
00276                 }
00277             }
00278             return GetKey();
00279         }
00280     }
00281 }
00282 
00283 void TelnetConnection::PutString(const char* const STR_Out) const
00284 {
00285     if (STR_Out != NULL)
00286     {
00287         const int i_Len = send(m_iSocket, STR_Out, (int) strlen(STR_Out), 0);
00288         if (i_Len != (signed) strlen(STR_Out))
00289         {
00290             m_cliLastError
00291                 .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_EN, "Telnet emission error")
00292                 .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_FR, "Echec d'émission en telnet");
00293 
00294             if (i_Len < 0)
00295             {
00296                 GetTraces().Trace(INTERNAL_ERROR) << "send failed" << endl;
00297             }
00298             else if ((unsigned) i_Len < strlen(STR_Out))
00299             {
00300                 GetTraces().Trace(INTERNAL_ERROR)
00301                     << "send incomplete"
00302                     << " (only " << i_Len << " characters sent"
00303                     << " over " << (unsigned int) strlen(STR_Out) << ")" << endl;
00304             }
00305             else if ((unsigned) i_Len > strlen(STR_Out))
00306             {
00307                 GetTraces().Trace(INTERNAL_ERROR)
00308                     << "strange send return value"
00309                     << " (" << i_Len << " for " << (unsigned int) strlen(STR_Out) << " characters sent)" << endl;
00310             }
00311         }
00312     }
00313 }
